body:
So i have been buying Diamond for a while and i just got back from vacation and im now emerald. Please help this has happened in the past and is annoying try to fix it as soon as possible.

                                                -poncho45

replies.body:
We had an issue with this a while back, this is most likely why you don't have Diamond: http://avicus.net/forums/6509f018b

Please e-mail support@avicus.net with proof of purchase.
